conbody.note: IdlLAB Linux binaries compiled for the i386 architecture can be found in the Linux/ directory of the installation disc.
conbody.p: For Linux distributions supporting DEB package format (Debian, Ubuntu, Linux Mint, Knoppix, etc.), open a terminal window and run from the command prompt:

conbody.note: Complete list of distributions supporting the RPM package format can be found at http://rpm.org/.
conbody.p: Please contact the manufacturer to obtain source code for IdlLAB: support@lainlab.com.
